data.eml:eml: Redescription of Sillago (Parasillago) indica McKay, Dutt & Sujatha, 1985 (Perciformes: Sillaginidae), with a reassignment to the subgenus Sillago

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaga, Tatsuya, Ho, Hsuan-Ching (2012): Redescription of Sillago (Parasillago) indica McKay, Dutt & Sujatha, 1985 (Perciformes: Sillaginidae), with a reassignment to the subgenus Sillago. Zootaxa 3513: 61-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282562
